title: No one injured after large house fire in southern Indiana | Local News | wdrb.com
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. (WDRB) -- No one was injured in a large house fire in southern Indiana early Thursday morning.
In a social media post, Tri-Township Fire and Rescue said it took multiple agencies to take down the fire in the 12000 block of Masters Pointe. That's in Sellersburg, Indiana.
Fire crews said there were no injuries to firefighters or anyone inside the home.
It's unknown at this time what caused the fire.
